channel.title: Dart on Sky
channel.description: Recent content in Dart on Sky

item.title: Story Stains: Frontend
item.description: Another post about building Story Stains, the previous one can be found at “Story Stains: Backend”. Flutter Last year I took a in Angular from udemy, but for this project as Angular appears to be slowly dying, I decided to use another possible Google deadhorse, Flutter. This time I didn’t use a book, or tutorial or such to start building the application. For one, I coulnd’t find a good up to date tutorial and I somehow expected a quite prescriptive development environment, which was not what happened.
